author: PJ Forrest
text: Yessur!! I’m proud of you Skinny P! If my opinion mattered, I’d say that you went to the right fit too. Good job with the process! I don’t need to tell you to get to work because I know that’s what you do. https://t.co/ElC8VWw2c1

author: PJ Forrest
text: Proud of these young men!! I love seeing the progress from one week to the next…from one practice to the next. This is going to be a fun summer! https://t.co/7PYWQr8sQs

author: PJ Forrest
text: Yessur Ross!! Go get busy! Congratulations https://t.co/WQxE7QIQNy

text: Willie…I rock with you for the rest of your coaching career. In a league that’s about entertainment, it’s nice to see someone who really genuinely cares https://t.co/eIjG5vMl8R

author: PJ Forrest
text: That is an island that Klay Thompson does not want to be on…out there trying to stay in front of the young Bonez. Nahhhhh not happening

author: PJ Forrest
text:
Dear Bonez Hyland,

I’m a big fan of yours but if you ever leave Klay Thompson to close out hard on Andre Iguodala, our player-fan relationship might be over lol.

Sincerely,
Just a fan who doesn’t know ish

author: PJ Forrest
text: I didn’t watch a ton of NBA games this season, but I have seen a lot of the young talent in the L play in HS and college, and I have to say that I really like the future of L

text: Even Boogie Cousins’s non-reaction to a call on him is a reaction to a call on him

text: Do we still need to keep having this debate on who the BEST offensive player in the L is? Do we really? Kyrie Irving!!!

text: This dude is the best offensive player in the L! He can score it however you want it, and at 6’ he makes it look so easy https://t.co/yLSn3pmmFT

text: I wish Bacot would make one skilled move in the post. Stop tryin go to just beat guys up in there. Keep your balance and take what they give you one time

author: PJ Forrest
text: South Carolina was just at a 46% rate for Off Rebs before the Louisville game. Now they’re at 47%. Do you know how many Off Rebs they had to get to increase that 1% this late in the season? They’re relentless!!

author: PJ Forrest
text: This is so deserved!! @RoeTap210 you have put in so much work to earn this. The confidence and care you have for your boys is why they’ll go to any lengths for you. I’m proud of you, bro. My favorite coach!! https://t.co/7qWy3mm7DR

author: PJ Forrest
text: Who is this guy?!? What did David McCormack eat for pregame? They’re talking about the difference in the game is Kansas’s 3pt shooting. WRONG!! It’s been McCormack’s domination of the paint and KU’s defense
